    • IOController

      public IOController​(UserDB user_db, ProjectDB project_db, javafx.stage.Stage stage, javafx.scene.Scene scene, java.lang.String DB_PATH)
      File exportation/importation controller
      Parameters:
      user_db - The user database used to retrieve information from
      project_db - The project database used to retrieve information from
      stage - The application stage
      scene - The current scene (to swap back to)
      DB_PATH - The database path

    • onExportProject

      public void onExportProject​(java.lang.String password, Project project, java.lang.String archivePath) throws java.io.IOException, DatabaseException
      Export a complete project (root and all his children) in a "tar.gz" archive.
      Parameters:
      password - Password to be used to encrypt the file
      project - Project to be exported
      archivePath - Directory where the file will be saved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on file write error
      DatabaseException - when a database access error occurs

    • onImportProject

      public boolean onImportProject​(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String archivePath) throws java.sql.SQLException, java.io.IOException
      Import a complete project (root and all his children) from a archive "tar.gz".
      Parameters:
      password - The password to be used to decrypt the file
      archivePath - The path to the file
      Returns:
      false if the project already exists in the database, true on success
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when a database access error occurs
      java.io.IOException - on file read error

    • zip

      public void zip​(java.lang.String archiveName, java.lang.String sourcePath, java.lang.String destinationPath) throws java.io.IOException
      Zip a file in a "tar.gz" archive.
      Parameters:
      archiveName - Archive name
      sourcePath - path to source file
      destinationPath - path to destination
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • unzip

      public void unzip​(java.lang.String source, java.lang.String destination) throws java.io.IOException
      Unzip a tar.gz archive in a directory.
      Parameters:
      source - Source file
      destination - Destination file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • isProjectInDb

      public boolean isProjectInDb​(java.lang.String jsonFile) throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      Check if one of the sub-project of a complete project (root and his children) is in the Database.
      Parameters:
      jsonFile - Path to Json file
      Returns:
      true if the project is in the database, false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.sql.SQLException
